oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sand Pumpings, 1978-09 (Fall)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sand Pumpings was a literary magazine published by the students of Olean High School that featured interviews and articles of local, historical interest in addition to literary pieces.
